name: get_result_by_date
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool euro_millions.
Tool description: A rich API to get EuroMillions results. With this API you can consult the last result, submit the numbers of one or more bets and check how many numbers you hit. As it has a track record since 2004, you can even get statistics on the numbers that have been drawn the most, check if your lucky numbers have ever come out in previous draws or consult the results of a specific draw. For the most recent draws, you can find out how many bets matched the numbers and how much money each one received. ...
API description: Fetches the draws result for a specific date from the Euro Millions API.

date.description: The date for which to fetch the draws result in 'YYYY-MM-DD' format.
